thread.title: Frolicking Whales Give Kayakers The Ultimate Surprise
thread.title_full: Frolicking Whales Give Kayakers The Ultimate Surprise

author: Suzy Strutner
title: Frolicking Whales Give Kayakers The Ultimate Surprise
text:
Frolicking Whales Give Kayakers The Ultimate Surprise What a BREACH of privacy! üêã Suzy Strutner Associate Lifestyle Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/05/2015 10:48 AM EDT 
Whoa . 
A pair of kayakers were treated to the surprise of their lives last weekend when a pair of whales breached just yards from their boat , off the coast of New South Wales, Australia. 
Dylan Garft and Ben Gordon had only just turned on their GoPro , they told Australia's local 9news, when the massive creatures turned up out of the water near them. 
"Omigod, I filmed it," Garft says in the video, after whales send the kayak rocking. "Holy shit!" 
At least the whale didn't land directly on top of them , as was the case last month when a humpback whale nearly crushed two kayakers in California. 
These are the tourist moments you just can't plan. 
The Huffington Post reached out to Garft for comment and will update this post accordingly. 
Also on HuffPost: 11 Places Where It's Easy To Unplug of
